display_name: Obstructive Apnea Hypopnea Index (OAHI) at 4% oxygen desaturation
description: Obstructive Apnea Hypopnea Index at 4% oxygen desaturation.  Ratio of the count of all obstructive apneas plus the count of hypopneas associated with at least a 4% oxygen desaturation to the total sleep time expressed in hours. {[(Total number of obstructive apneas) + (Total number of hypopneas associated with >= 4% oxygen desaturation)] / (hours of sleep)}
calculation: 60 * ( hrembp4 + hrop4 + hnrbp4 + hnrop4 + oarbp + oarop + oanbp + oanop ) / slpprdp

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Obstructive apnea (all oxygen desaturations) Hypopnea (4% oxygen desaturation) Index
